item.title: Splunk Sysmon Configuration
item.description: Configure your Splunk Universal forwarder to send Sysmon logs to Splunk Okay locate your input.conf file and edit with your favorite text editor. It should be located somewhere similar to this C:\Program Files\SplunkUniversalForwarder\etc\apps\SplunkUniversalForwarder\local\inputs.conf and add the following [WinEventLog://Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational] checkpointInterval = 5 current_only = 0 disabled = 0 start_from = oldest
